title: Judge denies request to block affirmative action at West Point
description: A federal judge on Wednesday ruled the U.S. Military Academy at West Point can continue considering race in its admissions process, denying a request to block affirmative action policies in the school. title: Tennessee Republican: Call DC a 'sewer,' not a swamp
description: Rep. Tim Burchett says Washington should no longer be dubbed a “swamp,” because it gives real wetlands a bad name. “I wish people would quit calling it a ‘swamp,’” the Tennessee Republican said during a Wednesday interview on Real America’s Voice. “A swamp is actually something God created that actually works,” Burchett told the conservative media outlet....

description: United Nations experts are sounding the alarm over the planned execution of an Alabama inmate by nitrogen gas, arguing it is an "untested" method that could subject the inmate to "cruel, inhuman or degrading treatment" or torture. title: Trump consolidates his support within House GOP
description: Former President Trump has secured endorsements from every member of House GOP leadership, underscoring his enduring strength in the party less than two weeks before the Iowa caucuses kick off the Republican primary calendar. title: California retailers now required to have gender-neutral toy aisles
description: Major retailers in California are now required to have gender-neutral toy aisles under a new state law that went into effect Monday.

title: Transportation officials, police launch investigations into aircraft collision in Japan
description: Transportation officials and police have launched investigations into the communication between air traffic control and two aircraft after a fiery collision left five people dead in Japan on Tuesday.
